ADVENT.Message: Welcome to Adventure 12: 'THE GOLDEN VOYAGE' by William Demas and Scott Adams Dedicated: British band 'QUEEN'
Appears to be broken, with strange markings
One great big EYE has a focus in my direction!
Picture of a mountain and the word `SUN`
I can't tell which way that is!
Merchant calls me a thief and slits my throat!
There's a tremendous flash of light!
He gives a great big CRY
High atop mast is a crow's-nest
KING: I have been given only 3 days to live. You must seek for a way to restore my vitality. The gold is yours. Go now!
grabs me and eats me alive!
MAN: I'm afraid it's too late for me. Appeal to the Gods for help!
I've desecrated the holy fountain. I'm struck down by a THUNDERBOLT!
and DIES! Guards have me beheaded
Night air is COLD! I catch pneumonia and die
I'm lynched by angry mourners. Their King is dead. (AND SO AM I)!!
Get your copy of `FROG` from Adventure International today!
and transforms into a young man. CONGRATULATIONS!! Mission accomplished.
Cyclops staggers and steps on me!
Surprised merchant grabs it and runs like a thief!

Item.Text: Rope leading out of the pit
